purpose: The email announces the 7th International Workshop on Formal Methods for Autonomous Systems (FMAS 2025), scheduled to take place in Paris, France from November 17 to 19, 2025. It invites researchers to submit papers on formal verification techniques for autonomous systems, highlighting key challenges and encouraging collaboration. The workshop aims to address the unique challenges posed by autonomous systems and welcomes submissions in various categories, including vision papers, research previews, experience reports, and regular papers. Important dates for submissions and notifications are provided, along with details about the special topic on human-AI teams. The email also mentions the opportunity for remote participation and the organization of a journal special issue for extended papers.

evidence_sentences: 7th Workshop on Formal Methods for Autonomous Systems (FMAS 2025)
FMAS 2025 is a 2.5-day peer-reviewed international workshop that brings together researchers working on a range of techniques for the formal verification of autonomous systems.
FMAS welcomes submissions that use formal methods to specify, model, or verify autonomous systems; in whole or in part.
We encourage submissions that are advancing the applicability of formal methods for autonomous systems.
There are four categories of submission: Vision papers, Research previews, Experience report papers, Regular papers.
We will organise a journal special issue to collect extensions of papers accepted in FMAS 2025.
